name: Tabbycat
description: Debating tournament tabulation software for two-team parliamentary formats

DJANGO_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for cryptographic signing of user sessions.

TAB_DIRECTOR_EMAIL.description: Your email address. Tabbycat's developers may need to contact you to help diagnose any unexpected errors.

TIME_ZONE.description: The ISO standard time zone label for the tournament's location, e.g. 'Australia/Melbourne', 'Europe/London', 'US/Pacific', or 'Asia/Kuala_Lumpur'. You can find these by looking at the 'TZ*' column at http://wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones#List
